hotels.title: Malacca Five-Star Heritage Mansion Stay
hotels.description: Experience old-world elegance and timeless opulence at The Majestic Malacca, a beautifully restored 1920s mansion and member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World group. Steeped in history in the UNESCO World Heritage-listed city of Malacca, this boutique hotel invites you to discover the beauty of this 600-year-old coastal port city, before returning to the five-star grandeur hidden within the walls of this beguiling mansion. Pull up a seat at the mansion’s European-style saloon bar and sip a glass of whiskey neat, sink into the leather-bound chairs of The Lounge at The Mansion, curl up with a good book in the light-filled Library, and let the rare Malaccan cultural delicacies of The Mansion restaurant transport you on a culinary journey.
